entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 11.
